Statute.Title: Protection of Communities and Exploited Persons Act see Criminal Code and other Acts
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Protection des collectivités et des personnes victimes d’exploitation, Loi sur la)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2014, c. 25, ss. 46 to 48 in force on assent 06.11.2014; s. 45.1 in force 06.12.2014 see s. 49.
